post.author: 김태희
post.content:
Web Developer
About the Job
We are currently looking for a Web Developer to join our Aveda Canada Team. The Web Developer will support all web development functions within the marketing department including the development, implementation, and maintenance of all corporate web sites and relative material.




Strong technical knowledge of HTML, Actionscript 3 (Flash), CSS, PHP, and Javascript.

Understanding of web site structure and functionality.

Some knowledge of social media trends and web optimization.  

Fluent in AS 2.0 & AS 3.0 and best practices.

Skills in DHTML and programming JavaScript beneficial.

Excellent organization and communication skills.

Ability to work on multiple projects concurrently.

Flexible, open to changes, and proactive in soliciting feedback.

Strong analytical skills, detail-oriented, with the ability to meet tight deadlines.

Familiar with Adobe Software and working with Graphic Designers.

Knowledge of ASP/ASP.net, XML/XSLT, Database Integration an asset.


Please submit links to 3 samples of your work and a link to your online portfolio.



To apply for this position please visit www.collega.com/careers
post.title: Web Developer- Collega Inc
